repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Memorabila from Richard Jacobstein, ILR Class of 1956.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Richard Jacobstein graduated from the ILR School in 1956. He served as ILR Student Council President in 1955-1956.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of ILR School Class of 1956 memorabilia and biographical information about Richard Jacobstein.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ILR School Richard Jacobstein Memorabilia #/4119m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /4078: ILR School 40th Anniversary Documents /4118 MB: ILR School Alumni Memorabilia /4120: ILR School Alumni Scrapbooks

defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives 227 Ives Hall Tower Road Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheelref@cornell.edu https://catherwood.library.cornell.edu/kheel/

controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations
New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations. Alumni Association

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes program for ILR Senior Banquet, 1956; Last Will and Testament of the Class of 1956; newspaper clipping about Richard Jacobstein, 1955; biographical information about Jacobstein for ILR Reunion scrapbook, 1991.
